Title: A Room with a View
Description: Lucy meets George in a Florence pensione and the two share a brief romance before Lucy returns home, where she becomes engaged to Cecil. However, it isn't long before George unexpectedly enters her life again.

Title: 9½ Weeks
Description: A woman becomes involved with a man she barely knows. Complications develop during their sexual escapades.

Title: Midnight Special
Description: A father and son go on the run, pursued by the government and a cult drawn to the child's special powers.

Title: Another 48 Hrs.
Description: Jack Cates once again enlists the aid of ex-con Reggie Hammond - this time to take down The Iceman, a ruthless drug lord operating in the San Francisco bay area.

Title: Did You Hear About the Morgans?
Description: In New York City, an estranged couple who witness a murder are relocated to small town Wyoming as part of the Witness Protection Program.

Title: Sex and Lucía
Description: Various lives converge on an isolated island, all connected by an author whose novel has become inextricably entwined with his own life.

Title: The To-Do List
Description: Feeling pressured to become more sexually experienced before she goes to college, Brandy Klark makes a list of things to accomplish before hitting campus in the fall.

Title: Mean Machine
Description: A football star jailed for assault leads a group of inmates in a match against prison guards.

Title: Krampus
Description: A boy who has a bad Christmas accidentally summons a festive demon to his family home.

Title: The Hand That Rocks the Cradle
Description: After her humiliated husband kills himself, an embittered pregnant widow loses her child, and embarks on a mission of vengeance against a woman and her family.

Title: Friday the 13th Part - IV: The Final Chapter
Description: After being announced dead and taken to a morgue, Jason Voorhees spontaneously revives, escapes from the hospital, and stalks a group of friends renting a house in the countryside near Crystal Lake.

Title: Bully
Description: A pack of naïve teenagers conspire to murder a mutual friend, whose aggressive demeanor has proved too much.

Title: The Fog
Description: A thick mist full of vengeful spirits haunts a prosperous island town off the coast of Oregon, as its inhabitants try to learn their town's dark secret in order to stop it.

Title: Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham...
Description: After marrying a poor woman, rich Rahul is disowned by his father and moves to London to build a new life. Years later, his now-grown younger brother Rohan embarks on a mission to bring Rahul back home and reunite the family.

Title: Holy Motors
Description: A man boards a limousine to be driven to his day's work: nine mysterious "appointments."

Title: Amarcord
Description: A series of comedic and nostalgic vignettes set in a 1930s Italian coastal town.

Title: Wasabi
Description: In Japan for the funeral of his long-lost love, a tough French detective learns that he also has a teenage daughter and that her life is in danger from the Yakuza.

Title: Bullets Over Broadway
Description: In New York in 1928, a struggling playwright is forced to cast a mobster's talentless girlfriend in his latest drama in order to get it produced.

Title: Dead Ringers
Description: Twin gynecologists take full advantage of the fact that nobody can tell them apart, until their relationship begins to deteriorate over a woman.

Title: Batman: Mask of the Phantasm
Description: Batman is wrongly implicated in a series of murders of mob bosses actually done by a new vigilante assassin.

Title: Private Parts
Description: The autobiographical story of Howard Stern, the radio rebel who is now also a TV personality, an author and a movie star.

Title: Dead Calm
Description: After a tragedy, John Ingram and his wife Rae are spending some time isolated at sea, when they come across a stranger who has abandoned a sinking ship.

Title: The Broken Circle Breakdown
Description: Elise and Didier fall in love at first sight, in spite of their differences. He talks, she listens. He's a romantic atheist, she's a religious realist. When their daughter becomes seriously ill, their love is put on trial.

Title: The Message
Description: This epic historical drama chronicles the life and times of Prophet Muhammad and serves as an introduction to early Islamic history.

Title: It's a Mad Mad Mad Mad World
Description: A group of motorists witnesses a car crash in the California desert, and after the driver's dying words indicate the location of a hidden stash of loot, they turn against each in a race across the state to get to it.

Title: Presumed Innocent
Description: As a lawyer investigates the murder of a colleague, he finds himself more connected to the crime than anyone else.

Title: The Butterfly Effect 2
Description: Nick Larson discovers a supernatural way to alter his life and travel back in time to key moments in his life by looking at photographs.

Title: Hit and Run
Description: Former getaway driver Charles Bronson jeopardizes his Witness Protection Plan identity in order to help his girlfriend get to Los Angeles. The feds and Charles' former gang chase them on the road.

Title: The Last Legion
Description: As the Roman empire crumbles, young Romulus Augustus flees the city and embarks on a perilous voyage to Britain to track down a legion of supporters.

Title: The Class
Description: Teacher and novelist François Bégaudeau plays a version of himself as he negotiates a year with his racially mixed students from a tough Parisian neighborhood.

Title: Wish I Was Here
Description: A struggling actor, father and husband finds himself at a major crossroads, which forces him to examine his life, his family and his career.

Title: Pokémon: The First Movie
Description: Scientists genetically create a new Pokémon, Mewtwo, but the results are horrific and disastrous.

Title: Sophie's Choice
Description: Sophie is the survivor of Nazi concentration camps, who has found a reason to live with Nathan, a sparkling if unsteady American Jew obsessed with the Holocaust.

Title: Far from the Madding Crowd
Description: In Victorian England, the independent and headstrong Bathsheba Everdene attracts three very different suitors: Gabriel Oak, a sheep farmer; Frank Troy, a reckless Sergeant; and William Boldwood, a prosperous and mature bachelor.

Title: The Fifth Estate
Description: A dramatic thriller based on real events that reveals the quest to expose the deceptions and corruptions of power that turned an Internet upstart into the 21st century's most fiercely debated organization.

Title: Central Intelligence
Description: After he reconnects with an awkward pal from high school through Facebook, a mild-mannered accountant is lured into the world of international espionage.

Title: The Day of the Jackal
Description: In the aftermath of France allowing Algeria's independence, a group of resentful military veterans hire a professional assassin codenamed "Jackal" to kill President Charles de Gaulle.

Title: Evita
Description: The hit musical based on the life of

Title: Drishyam
Description: Desperate measures are taken by a man who tries to save his family from the dark side of the law, after they commit an unexpected crime.

Title: Soul Kitchen
Description: In Hamburg, German-Greek chef Zinos unknowingly disturbs the peace in his locals-only restaurant by hiring a more talented chef.

Title: Camp X-Ray
Description: A soldier assigned to Guantanamo Bay befriends a man who has been imprisoned there.

Title: Sunrise: A Song of Two Humans
Description: A sophisticated urban woman seduces a farmer in the hopes that he will murder his neglected wife and join her in the city, but he soon finds himself rekindling his romance with the latter when she discovers their scheme.

Title: Belle de Jour
Description: A frigid young housewife decides to spend her midweek afternoons as a prostitute.

Title: The Nines
Description: A troubled actor, a television show runner, and an acclaimed videogame designer find their lives intertwining in mysterious and unsettling ways.

Title: Adam
Description: Adam, a lonely man with Asperger's Syndrome, develops a relationship with his upstairs neighbor, Beth.

Title: The Roommate
Description: When college freshman Sara arrives on campus for the first time, she befriends her roommate, Rebecca, unaware that the girl is becoming dangerously obsessed with her.

Title: Udaan
Description: Expelled from his school, a 16-year old boy returns home to his abusive and oppressive father.

Title: Uptown Girls
Description: A grown-up woman who kept her childish instincts and behavior starts working as the nanny of an 8-year-old girl who actually acts like an adult. But everything ends right-side up.

Title: Hollywoodland
Description: A detective examines the mysterious death of

Title: The Last Starfighter
Description: High schooler Alex Rogan conquers the Starfighter video game, only to find out it was just a test, and is transported to another planet. He has been recruited to join a team of the best starfighters to defend their world from the attack.

Title: Igby Goes Down
Description: A young man's peculiar upbringing renders him unable to competently cope with the struggle of growing up.

Title: Apt Pupil
Description: A boy blackmails his neighbor after suspecting him to be a Nazi war criminal.

Title: Nowhere Boy
Description: A chronicle of

Title: The Paperboy
Description: A reporter returns to his Florida hometown to investigate a case involving a death row inmate.

Title: Big Fat Liar
Description: Fourteen-year-old Jason Shepherd has a reputation for stretching the truth. So, when big-time Hollywood producer Marty Wolf steals his class paper and turns it into a smash hit movie, no one believes Jason's latest tall tale.

Title: Inside
Description: Four months after the death of her husband, a woman on the brink of motherhood is tormented in her home by a strange woman who wants her unborn baby.

Title: Zulu
Description: Outnumbered British soldiers do battle with Zulu warriors at Rorke's Drift.

Title: Liberal Arts
Description: When 30-something Jesse returns to his alma mater for a professor's retirement party, he falls for Zibby, a college student, and is faced with a powerful attraction that springs up between them.

Title: Up in Smoke
Description: Two stoners unknowingly smuggle a van - made entirely of marijuana - from Mexico to L.A., with incompetent Sgt. Stedenko on their trail.

Title: Central Station
Description: The emotive journey of a former schoolteacher who writes letters for illiterate people, and a young boy whose mother has just died, as they search for the father he never knew.

Title: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner
Description: A couple's attitudes are challenged when their daughter introduces them to her African-American fiancé.

Title: Message in a Bottle
Description: A woman discovers a tragic love letter in a bottle on a beach, and is determined to track down its author.

Title: Book of Shadows: Blair Witch 2
Description: A group of tourists arrives in Burkittsville, Maryland after seeing

Title: Shattered Glass
Description: The story of a young journalist who fell from grace when it was discovered he fabricated over half of his articles from the publication The New Republic magazine.

Title: Om Shanti Om
Description: In the 1970s, Om, an aspiring actor, is murdered, but is immediately reincarnated into the present day. He attempts to discover the mystery of his demise and find Shanti, the love of his previous life.

Title: Bandidas
Description: In turn-of-the-century Mexico, two very different women become a bank-robbing duo in an effort to combat a ruthless enforcer terrorizing their town.

Title: Red Tails
Description: A crew of African American pilots in the Tuskegee training program, having faced segregation while kept mostly on the ground during World War II, are called into duty under the guidance of Col. A.J. Bullard.

Title: The New Guy
Description: A high school senior branded uncool in the ninth grade gets himself expelled so he changes his image to cool kid at the town's other high school.

Title: Thick as Thieves
Description: A veteran thief recruits a younger crook to help him pull off one final job in order to repay his debt to the Russian mob.

Title: The Cooler
Description: In an old school Las Vegas casino, its top gambling jinx breaks his curse when he falls in love, much to his boss' consternation.

Title: Double Impact
Description: Twin brothers are separated when their parents are murdered but 25 years later they re-unite in order to avenge their parents' death.

Title: The Crucible
Description: A Salem resident attempts to frame her ex-lover's wife for being a witch in the middle of the 1692 witchcraft trials.

Title: Drumline
Description: A band director recruits a Harlem street drummer to play at a Southern university.

Title: Exorcist: The Beginning
Description: Years before Father Lankester Merrin helped save Regan MacNeil's soul, he first encounters the demon Pazuzu in East Africa. This is the tale of Father Merrin's initial battle with Pazuzu and the rediscovery of his faith.

Title: The Great Outdoors
Description: A Chicago man and his family go camping with his obnoxious brother-in-law.

Title: The Cave
Description: Blood-thirsty creatures await a pack of divers who become trapped in an underwater cave network.

Title: Seed of Chucky
Description: Chucky and Tiffany are resurrected by their innocent gender-confused daughter, Glenda, and hit Hollywood, where a movie depicting the killer dolls' murder spree is underway.

Title: Femme Fatale
Description: A woman tries to straighten out her life, even as her past as a con-woman comes back to haunt her.

Title: Key Largo
Description: A man visits his war buddy's family hotel and finds a gangster running things. As a hurricane approaches, the two end up confronting each other.

Title: Choke
Description: A sex-addicted con-man pays for his mother's hospital bills by playing on the sympathies of those who rescue him from choking to death.

Title: Halloween III: Season of the Witch
Description: Kids all over America want Silver Shamrock masks for Halloween. Doctor Daniel Challis seeks to uncover a plot by Silver Shamrock owner Conal Cochran.

Title: Admission
Description: A Princeton admissions officer who is up for a major promotion takes a professional risk after she meets a college-bound alternative school kid who just might be the son she gave up years ago in a secret adoption.

Title: The Cold Light of Day
Description: After his family is kidnapped during their sailing trip in Spain, a young Wall Street trader is confronted by the people responsible: intelligence agents looking to recover a mysterious briefcase.

Title: The Last Days on Mars
Description: A group of astronaut explorers succumb one by one to a mysterious and terrifying force while collecting specimens on Mars.

Title: Secrets & Lies
Description: Following the death of her adoptive parents, a successful young black optometrist establishes contact with her biological mother -- a lonely white factory worker living in poverty in East London.

Title: The Shipping News
Description: An emotionally beaten man with his young daughter moves to his ancestral home in Newfoundland to reclaim his life.

Title: Bachelor Party
Description: A soon-to-be-married man's friends throw him the ultimate bachelor party.

Title: The Killer Inside Me
Description: A West Texas Deputy Sheriff is slowly unmasked as a psychotic killer.

Title: Hard Eight
Description: Professional gambler Sydney teaches John the tricks of the trade. John does well until he falls for cocktail waitress Clementine.

Title: Paranoia
Description: An entry-level employee at a powerful corporation finds himself occupying a corner office, but at a dangerous price: he must spy on his boss's old mentor to secure for him a multi-billion dollar advantage.

Title: The Illusionist
Description: A French illusionist finds himself out of work and travels to Scotland, where he meets a young woman. Their ensuing adventure changes both their lives forever.

Title: Manhattan Murder Mystery
Description: A middle-aged couple suspects foul play when their neighbor's wife suddenly drops dead.

Title: Adventures in Babysitting
Description: A babysitter must battle her way through the big city after being stranded there with the kids she's looking after.

Title: Man Bites Dog
Description: A film crew follows a ruthless thief and heartless killer as he goes about his daily routine. But complications set in when the film crew lose their objectivity and begin lending a hand.

Title: Spice World
Description: World famous pop group the Spice Girls zip around London in their luxurious double decker tour bus having various adventures and performing for their fans.

Title: The Lazarus Effect
Description: A group of medical researchers discover a way to bring dead patients back to life.

Title: Hera Pheri
Description: Three unemployed men look for answers to all their money problems - but when their opportunity arrives, will they know what to do with it?

Title: Keeping Mum
Description: A pastor preoccupied with writing the perfect sermon fails to realize that his wife is having an affair, and his children are up to no good.

Title: Brewster's Millions
Description: A minor-league baseball player must spend $30 million in 30 days in order to inherit $300 million. However, he's not allowed to own any assets, destroy the money, gift it, give it to charity, or tell anyone about the deal.

Title: Force Majeure
Description: A family vacationing in the French Alps is confronted with a devastating avalanche.

Title: Killing Season
Description: Two veterans of the Bosnian War, one American, one Serbian, find their unlikely friendship tested when one of them reveals their true intentions.

Title: The Gunman
Description: A sniper on a mercenary assassination team kills the minister of mines of the Congo. Terrier's successful kill shot forces him into hiding. Returning to the Congo years later, he becomes the target of a hit squad himself.

Title: Dolores Claiborne
Description: A big city reporter travels to a small town where her mother has been arrested for the murder of an elderly woman for whom she worked as a housekeeper.

Title: The Good Son
Description: A young boy stays with his aunt and uncle and becomes friends with his cousin, a boy of the same age who shows increasing signs of violent and psychopathic behavior.

Title: Jaws 3
Description: A giant thirty-five-foot shark becomes trapped in a SeaWorld theme park and it's up to the sons of police chief Brody to rescue everyone.

Title: Slap Shot
Description: A failing ice hockey team finds success with outrageously violent hockey goonery.

Title: Alex Cross
Description: A homicide detective is pushed to the brink of his moral and physical limits as he tangles with a ferociously skilled hired killer who specializes in torture and pain.

Title: Silverado
Description: A misfit bunch of friends comes together to right the injustices which exist in a small town.

Title: Man of Tai Chi
Description: A young martial artist's unparalleled Tai Chi skills land him in a highly lucrative underworld fight club.

Title: Maps to the Stars
Description: A tour into the heart of a Hollywood family chasing celebrity, one another and the relentless ghosts of their pasts.

Title: I Love You, Beth Cooper
Description: A nerdy valedictorian proclaims his love for Beth Cooper--the hottest, most popular girl in school--during his graduation speech. That very night, she shows up at his door offering to show him the best night of his life.

Title: Cube Zero
Description: A young programmer whose job is to watch over the reality-warping Cube defies orders to rescue an innocent mother trapped in one of its rooms.

Title: The Four Feathers
Description: A British officer resigns his post just before battle and subsequently receives four white feathers from his friends and fiancee as symbols of what they believe to be his cowardice.

Title: Victor Frankenstein
Description: Told from Igor's perspective, we see the troubled young assistant's dark origins, his redemptive friendship with the young medical student Viktor Von Frankenstein, and become eyewitnesses to the emergence of how Frankenstein became the man - and the legend - we know today.

Title: The Secret Garden
Description: A young, recently-orphaned girl is sent to England after living in India all of her life. Once there, she begins to explore her new, seemingly-isolated surroundings, and its secrets.

Title: Captain Corelli's Mandolin
Description: When a fisherman leaves to fight with the Greek army during World War II, his fiancée falls in love with the local Italian commander.

Title: Nim's Island
Description: A young girl inhabits an isolated island with her scientist father and communicates with a reclusive author of the novel she's reading.

Title: Hot Tub Time Machine 2
Description: When Lou's shot in the groin, Nick and Jacob drag him in the Hot Tub Time Machine to go back in time and save Lou. The three end up 10 years in the future, where they need to go to find the shooter.

Title: The Double Life of Véronique
Description: Two parallel stories about two identical women; one living in Poland, the other in France. They don't know each other, but their lives are nevertheless profoundly connected.

Title: Find Me Guilty
Description: In the late 1980s, a low level gangster named Jackie DiNorscio defends himself in court in what became the longest criminal trial in American judicial history.

Title: Masters of the Universe
Description: The heroic warrior He-Man battles against the evil lord Skeletor and his armies of darkness for control of Castle Grayskull.

Title: Heist
Description: A career jewel thief finds himself at tense odds with his longtime partner, a crime boss who sends his nephew to keep watch.

Title: So I Married an Axe Murderer
Description: A San Francisco poet who fears commitment suspects his girlfriend may have a knack for killing off her significant others.

Title: Joe Versus the Volcano
Description: When a hypochondriac learns that he is dying, he accepts an offer to throw himself in a volcano at a tropical island, and along the way there, learns to truly live.

Title: Man of the Year
Description: A comedian who hosts a news satire program decides to run for president, and a computerized voting machine malfunction gets him elected.

Title: Ride Along 2
Description: As his wedding day approaches, Ben heads to Miami with his soon-to-be brother-in-law James to bring down a drug dealer who's supplying the dealers of Atlanta with product.

Title: Muriel's Wedding
Description: A young social outcast in Australia steals money from her parents to finance a vacation where she hopes to find happiness, and perhaps love.

Title: Shane
Description: A weary gunfighter in 1880s Wyoming begins to envision a quieter life after befriending a homestead family with a young son who idolizes him, but a smoldering range war forces him to act.

Title: Smoke
Description: A Brooklyn smoke shop is the center of neighborhood activity, and the stories of its customers.

Title: D2: The Mighty Ducks
Description: Can Gordon's team win the Junior Goodwill Games in California in spite of all the set-backs?

Title: Thesis
Description: While doing a thesis about violence, Ángela finds a snuff video where a girl is tortured until death. Soon she discovers that the girl was a former student in her faculty...

Title: The Railway Man
Description: A former British Army officer, who was tortured as a prisoner of war at a Japanese labor camp during World War II, discovers that the man responsible for much of his treatment is still alive and sets out to confront him.

Title: Charlotte's Web
Description: Wilbur the pig is scared of the end of the season, because he knows that come that time, he will end up on the dinner table. He hatches a plan with Charlotte, a spider that lives in his pen, to ensure that this will never happen.

Title: Talaash
Description: Inspector Surjan Shekhawat, who is dealing with a depressing past, has to investigate a high profile murder case, deal with his crumbling marriage and use the help and solace of a prostitute by the name of Rosie.

Title: The Lawnmower Man
Description: A simple man is turned into a genius through the application of computer science.

Title: St. Elmo's Fire
Description: A group of friends, just out of college, struggle with adulthood.

Title: Who Am I?
Description: A Secret Agent loses his memory after falling from a crashing helicopter. He is then chased by several other agency operatives, but he has no idea why.

Title: Emma
Description: While matchmaking for friends and neighbours, a young 19th Century Englishwoman nearly misses her own chance at love.

Title: Velvet Goldmine
Description: In 1984, British journalist Arthur Stuart investigates the career of 1970s glam superstar Brian Slade, who was heavily influenced in his early years by hard-living and rebellious American singer Curt Wild.

Title: Undisputed 3: Redemption
Description: Boyka is back. This time he is fighting in the first ever inter-prison tournament with one knee.

Title: The Loved Ones
Description: When Brent turns down his classmate Lola's invitation to the prom, she concocts a wildly violent plan for revenge.

Title: It Could Happen to You
Description: A police officer promises to share his lottery ticket with a waitress in lieu of a tip.

Title: In the Land of Women
Description: A sleazy writer has a chance to redeem himself when he goes to stay with his grandmother and befriends the neighbors.
The famous 1970s New York City nightclub seen and told through the eyes of a young employee.

Title: Sweet and Lowdown
Description: In the 1930s, jazz guitarist Emmet Ray idolizes Django Reinhardt, faces gangsters and falls in love with a mute woman.

Title: Leatherheads
Description: In 1925, an enterprising pro football player convinces America's too-good-to-be-true college football hero to play for his team and keep the league from going under.

Title: Dungeons & Dragons
Description: Profion, a tyrant, attempts to overthrow a peaceful kingdom ruled by a tough empress.

Title: Chaos Theory
Description: The story of an obsessively organized efficiency expert whose life unravels in unexpected ways when fate forces him to explore the serendipitous nature of love and forgiveness.

Title: Bug
Description: An unhinged war veteran holes up with a lonely woman in a spooky Oklahoma motel room. The line between reality and delusion is blurred as they discover a bug infestation.

Title: Prom Night
Description: Donna's senior prom is supposed to be the best night of her life, though a sadistic killer from her past has different plans for her and her friends.

Title: Bananas
Description: When a bumbling New Yorker is dumped by his activist girlfriend, he travels to a tiny Latin American nation and becomes involved in its latest rebellion.

Title: Fighting
Description: In New York City, a young counterfeiter is introduced to the world of underground street fighting by a seasoned scam artist, who becomes his manager on the bare-knuckling brawling circuit.

Title: To Strike
Description: The efforts of the Pakistani security forces in their fight against terrorism and how the lives of security officials are affected. A retired security officer returns to save Pakistan from a major terrorist attack.

Title: The Phantom
Description: The Phantom, descendent of a line of African superheroes, travels to New York City to thwart a wealthy criminal genius from obtaining three magic skulls which would give him the secret to ultimate power.

Title: Love and Death
Description: In czarist Russia, a neurotic soldier and his distant cousin formulate a plot to assassinate Napoleon.

Title: The Amityville Horror
Description: Newlyweds and their three children move into a large house where a mass murder was committed. They start to experience strange, inexplicable manifestations which have strong effects on everyone living in or visiting the house.

Title: Exit Wounds
Description: Orin Boyd, a tough cop in an inner-city precinct discovers a web of dirty cops and corruption.

Title: Children of Heaven
Description: After a boy loses his sister's pair of shoes, he goes on a series of adventures in order to find them. When he can't, he tries a new way to "win" a new pair.

Title: Blow Out
Description: A movie sound recordist accidentally records the evidence that proves that a car accident was actually murder and consequently finds himself in danger.

Title: The Way of the Gun
Description: Two criminal drifters without sympathy get more than they bargained for after kidnapping and holding for ransom the surrogate mother carrying a baby for a powerful, shady man.

Title: Christmas with the Kranks
Description: With their daughter, Blair, away in Peru, Luther and Nora Krank decide to skip Christmas all together until she decides to come home, causing an uproar when they have to celebrate it at the last minute.

Title: The Lizzie McGuire Movie
Description: Lizzie McGuire has graduated from middle school and takes a trip to Rome, Italy with her class. And what was supposed to be only a normal trip, becomes a teenager's dream come true.

Title: Fantasia 2000
Description: An update of the original film with new interpretations of great works of classical music.

Title: The Missing
Description: In 1885 New Mexico, a frontier medicine woman forms an uneasy alliance with her estranged father when her daughter is kidnapped by an Apache brujo.

Title: The Secret of N-I-M-H
Description: To save her ill son, a field mouse must seek the aid of a colony of rats, with whom she has a deeper link than she suspected.

Title: Snoopy and Charlie Brown: The Peanuts Movie
Description: Snoopy embarks upon his greatest mission as he and his team take to the skies to pursue their archnemesis, while his best pal Charlie Brown begins his own epic quest back home to win the love of his life.

Title: Slow West
Description: A young Scottish man travels across America in pursuit of the woman he loves, attracting the attention of an outlaw who is willing to serve as a guide.

Title: The Tenant
Description: A bureaucrat rents a Paris apartment where he finds himself drawn into a rabbit hole of dangerous paranoia.

Title: The Marine
Description: A group of diamond thieves on the run kidnap the wife of a recently discharged marine who goes on a chase through the South Carolinian wilderness to retrieve her.

Title: Next Friday
Description: A streetwise man flees South Central Los Angeles, heading to the suburbs and his lottery-winner uncle and cousin, to avoid a neighborhood thug with a grudge who has just escaped from prison.

Title: Garfield 2
Description: Jon and Garfield visit the United Kingdom, where a case of mistaken cat identity finds Garfield ruling over a castle. His reign is soon jeopardized by the nefarious Lord Dargis, who has designs on the estate.

Title: Fools Rush In
Description: After a one night stand with Alex, Isabel realizes that she is pregnant and they decide to get married. However, along with the marriage comes compromise of one's own cultural traditions.

Title: Che: Part Two
Description: In 1967, Ernesto 'Che' Guevara leads a small partisan army to fight an ill-fated revolutionary guerrilla war in Bolivia, South America.

Title: Jules and Jim
Description: Decades of a love triangle concerning two friends and an impulsive woman.

Title: Dracula 2001
Description: A group of thieves breaks into a chamber expecting to find paintings, but instead they release the count himself, who travels to New Orleans to find his nemesis' daughter, Mary Van Helsing.

Title: Mommy
Description: A widowed single mother, raising her violent son alone, finds new hope when a mysterious neighbor inserts herself into their household.

Title: The Woodsman
Description: A child molester returns to his hometown after 12 years in prison and attempts to start a new life.

Title: Mother
Description: A mother desperately searches for the killer who framed her son for a girl's horrific murder.

Title: Shortbus
Description: A group of New Yorkers caught up in their romantic-sexual milieu converge at an underground salon infamous for its blend of art, music, politics, and carnality.

Title: Caligula
Description: A dramatization of the ascent to Caesar and subsequent reign of Caligula, one of the most notorious leaders of ancient Rome. We see his ambition, his scheming, his perversion and decadence, his brutality and his lunacy.

Title: Passengers
Description: A grief counselor working with a group of plane-crash survivors finds herself at the root of a mystery when her clients begin to disappear.

Title: City Island
Description: Prison guard Vince tells Molly from acting class, that one inmate is his 24 y.o. love child. Vince takes him home to stay with his family - straight A son with fat girl fetish, college dropout/stripper daughter and cute wife.

Title: Get Carter
Description: A Las Vegas mob enforcer travels back to his hometown to investigate his brother's mysterious death.

Title: Lage Raho Munna Bhai
Description: Munna Bhai embarks on a journey with Mahatma Gandhi in order to fight against a corrupt property dealer.

Title: The Wackness
Description: It's the summer of 1994, and the streets of New York are pulsing with hip-hop. Set against this backdrop, a lonely teenager named Luke Shapiro spends his last summer before university selling marijuana throughout New York City, trading it with his unorthodox psychotherapist for treatment, while having a crush on his stepdaughter.

Title: Perfect Blue
Description: A pop singer gives up her career to become an actress, but she slowly goes insane when she starts being stalked by an obsessed fan and what seems to be a ghost of her past.

Title: Drop Dead Gorgeous
Description: A small-town beauty pageant turns deadly as it becomes clear that someone will go to any lengths to win.

Title: Maniac
Description: As he helps a young artist with her upcoming exhibition, the owner of a mannequin shop's deadly, suppressed desires come to the surface.

Title: C.R.A.Z.Y.
Description: A young French Canadian, one of five boys in a conservative family in the 1960s and 1970s, struggles to reconcile his emerging identity with his father's values.

Title: The Innkeepers
Description: During the final days at the Yankee Pedlar Inn, two employees determined to reveal the hotel's haunted past begin to experience disturbing events as old guests check in for a stay.

Title: The Smurfs 2
Description: The Smurfs team up with their human friends to rescue Smurfette, who has been abducted by Gargamel, since she knows a secret spell that can turn the evil sorcerer's newest creation, creatures called "The Naughties", into real Smurfs.

Title: The Time Machine
Description: A man's vision for a utopian society is disillusioned when travelling forward into time reveals a dark and dangerous society.

Title: Instinct
Description: When noted anthropologist Dr. Ethan Powell, who left society to live in the jungle is imprisoned for murder, it's up to young psychiatrist Theo Caulder to get through to him.

Title: OMG: Oh My God!
Description: A shopkeeper takes God to court when his shop is destroyed by an earthquake.

Title: Peggy Sue Got Married
Description: Peggy Sue faints at a high school reunion. When she wakes up, she finds herself in her own past, just before she finished school.

Title: Dark Places
Description: Libby Day was only eight years old when her family was brutally murdered in their rural Kansas farmhouse. Almost thirty years later, she reluctantly agrees to revisit the crime and uncovers the wrenching truths that led up to that tragic night.

Title: Throw Momma from the Train
Description: A bitter ex-husband wants his former spouse dead. A put-upon momma's boy wants his mother dead. Who will pull it off?

Title: Melinda and Melinda
Description: Two alternating stories, one comedy and the other tragedy, about Melinda's attempts to straighten out her life.

Title: The Discreet Charm of the Bourgeoisie
Description: A surreal, virtually plotless series of dreams centered around six middle-class people and their consistently interrupted attempts to have a meal together.

Title: Straw Dogs
Description: Los Angeles screenwriter David Sumner relocates with his wife to her hometown in the deep South. There, while tensions build between them, a brewing conflict with locals becomes a threat to them both.

Title: The Rescuers Down Under
Description: R.A.S. agents Miss Bianca and Bernard race to Australia to save a little boy and a rare golden eagle from a murderous poacher.

Title: Cypher
Description: An unsuspecting, disenchanted man finds himself working as a spy in the dangerous, high-stakes world of corporate espionage. Quickly getting way over-his-head, he teams up with a mysterious femme fatale.

Title: The Final Cut
Description: Set in a world with memory recording implants, Alan Hakman is a cutter, someone with the power of final edit over people's recorded histories. His latest assignment is one that puts him in danger.

Title: The Boy Next Door
Description: A woman, separated from her unfaithful husband, falls for a younger man who has moved in next door, but their torrid affair soon takes a dangerous turn.

Title: V/H/S/2
Description: Searching for a missing student, two private investigators break into his house and find collection of VHS tapes. Viewing the horrific contents of each cassette, they realize there may be dark motives behind the student's disappearance.

Title: Where the Heart Is

Title: The Cook, the Thief, His Wife & Her Lover
Description: At Le Hollandais gourmet restaurant, every night is filled with opulence, decadence and gluttony. But when the cook, a thief, his wife and her lover all come together, they unleash a shocking torrent of sex, food, murder and revenge.

Title: Cake

Title: Coriolanus
Description: A banished hero of Rome allies with a sworn enemy to take his revenge on the city.

Title: The Quiet Man
Description: A retired American boxer returns to the village of his birth in 1920s Ireland, where he falls for a spirited redhead whose brother is contemptuous of their union.

Title: 24 Hour Party People
Description: In 1976, Tony Wilson sets up Factory Records and brings Manchester's music to the world.

Title: Son of Rambow
Description: During a long English summer in the early 1980s, two schoolboys from differing backgrounds set out to make a film inspired by

Title: Last Knights
Description: A fallen warrior rises against a corrupt and sadistic ruler to avenge his dishonored master.

Title: The Edukators
Description: Three activists cobble together a kidnapping plot after they encounter a businessman in his home.

Title: Hair
Description: Claude Bukowski leaves the family ranch in Oklahoma for New York where he is rapidly embraced into the hippie group of youngsters led by Berger, yet he's already been drafted. He soon falls in love with Sheila Franklin, a rich girl but still a rebel inside.

Title: Tideland
Description: Because of the actions of her irresponsible parents, a young girl is left alone on a decrepit country estate and survives inside her fantastic imagination.

Title: The Unbearable Lightness of Being
Description: Central Europe, 1968: A Czech doctor with an active sex life meets a woman who wants monogamy, and then the Soviet invasion further disrupts their lives.

Title: Halloween: Resurrection
Description: Three years after he last terrorized his sister, Michael Myers confronts her again, before traveling to Haddonfield to deal with the cast and crew of a reality show which is being broadcast from his old home.

Title: Hard Rain
Description: The partner and nephew of an armored-truck driver tries to prevent three million dollars from being taken by a gang during a catastrophic flooding caused by a severe storm.

Title: The Human Centipede 2 (Full Sequence)
Description: Inspired by the fictional Dr. Heiter, disturbed loner Martin dreams of creating a 12-person centipede and sets out to realize his sick fantasy.

Title: 2 Days in Paris
Description: Marion and Jack try to rekindle their relationship with a visit to Paris, home of Marion's parents -- and several of her ex-boyfriends.

Title: Cujo
Description: Cujo, a friendly St. Bernard, contracts rabies and conducts a reign of terror on a small American town.

Title: The Skulls
Description: A senior at an ivy league college, who depends on scholarships and working on the side, gets accepted into the secret society The Skulls. He hopes it betters chances at Harvard but The Skulls is not what he thought and comes at a price.

Title: Pathology

Title: Vicky Donor
Description: A man is brought in by an infertility doctor to supply him with his sperm, where he becomes the biggest sperm donor for his clinic.

Title: Little Big Man

Title: The Red Violin

Title: Now Is Good

Title: Ninja Scroll

Title: Flypaper

Title: The Ridiculous 6

Title: Westworld

Title: May

Title: Welcome to the Punch
Description: When a notorious criminal is forced to return to London, it gives a detective one last chance to take down the man he's always been after.

Title: Agent Cody Banks

Title: The Salton Sea
Description: After a tragic incident, a man drifts into a world populated by thugs and speed junkies.

Title: The Sweet Hereafter
Description: A bus crash in a small town brings a lawyer to the town to defend the families, but he discovers that everything is not what it seems.

Title: If Only

Title: Forces of Nature

Title: Ghost in the Shell 2: Innocence
Description: In the year 2032, Batô, a cyborg detective for the anti-terrorist unit Public Security Section 9, investigates the case of a female robot--one created solely for sexual pleasure--who slaughtered her owner.

Title: The Finest Hours

Title: 5 Centimeters per Second

Title: Spartan

Title: One Missed Call

Title: Splinter

Title: Boat Trip

Title: Shutter
Description: A newly married couple discovers disturbing, ghostly images in photographs they develop after a tragic accident. Fearing the manifestations may be connected, they investigate and learn that some mysteries are better left unsolved.

Title: Deep Rising

Title: The Transporter Refuelled

Title: Welcome to the Dollhouse
Description: An awkward seventh-grader struggles to cope with inattentive parents, snobbish class-mates, a smart older brother, an attractive younger sister and her own insecurities in suburban New Jersey.

Title: Antwone Fisher
Description: Antwone Fisher, a young navy man, is forced to see a psychiatrist after a violent outburst against a fellow crewman. During the course of treatment a painful past is revealed and a new hope begins.

Title: Mesrine Part 1: Killer Instinct
Description: The story of the notorious French gangster

Title: Toys
Description: When Lieutenant General Leland Zevo (Sir Michael Gambon) inherits a toymaking company and begins making war toys, his employees band together to stop him before he ruins the name of Zevo Toys forever.

Title: Frequently Asked Questions About Time Travel
Description: While drinking at their local pub, three social outcasts attempt to navigate a time-travel conundrum.

Title: Tokyo Story
Description: An old couple visit their children and grandchildren in the city, but receive little attention.

Title: The Rookie
Description: A Texas baseball coach makes the major league after agreeing to try out if his high school team made the playoffs.

Title: Once Upon a Time in Anatolia
Description: A group of men set out in search of a dead body in the Anatolian steppes.

Title: Envy
Description: A man becomes increasingly jealous of his friend's newfound success.

Title: 102 Dalmatians
Description: Cruella DeVil gets out of prison and goes after the puppies once more.

Title: The Little Prince
Description: A little girl lives in a very grown-up world with her mother, who tries to prepare her for it. Her neighbor, the Aviator, introduces the girl to an extraordinary world where anything is possible, the world of the Little Prince.

Title: Mean Creek

Title: Bad Neighbours 2

Title: Fan
Description: Gaurav develops an obsession with a movie star who looks just like him. He goes to Bombay to meet his idol, but he refuses to grant him five minutes of his time. Gaurav is enraged and plots to destroy his hero.

Title: No Way Out

Title: Giant

Title: Kind Hearts and Coronets

Title: The Postman

Title: Brief Encounter
Description: Meeting a stranger in a railway station, a woman is tempted to cheat on her husband.

Title: Hababam Sinifi
Description: Lazy, uneducated students share a very close bond. They live together in the dormitory, where they plan their latest pranks. When a new headmaster arrives, the students naturally try to overthrow him. A comic war of nitwits follows.

Title: Rubber
Description: A homicidal car tire, discovering it has destructive psionic power, sets its sights on a desert town once a mysterious woman becomes its obsession.

Title: P2

Title: Doc Hollywood

Title: The Company You Keep

Title: Blue Crush

Title: Happythankyoumoreplease

Description: Cheyenne, a retired rock star living off his royalties in Dublin, returns to New York City to find the man responsible for a humiliation suffered by his recently deceased father during W.W.II.

Title: Boogeyman

Title: The Edge of Heaven
Description: A Turkish man travels to Istanbul to find the daughter of his father's former girlfriend.

Title: Green Room

Title: One Night at McCool's

Title: Bitter Moon

Title: Solace
Description: Psychic John Clancy (Sir Anthony Hopkins) works with the F.B.I. in order to hunt down a serial killer.

Title: K-9

Title: Angel-A

Title: Priceless
Description: Through a set of wacky circumstances, a young gold digger mistakenly woos a mild-mannered bartender, thinking he's a wealthy suitor.

Title: Astro Boy

Title: Dragnet

Title: Osmosis Jones

Title: After the Wedding
Description: A manager of an orphanage in India is sent to Copenhagen, Denmark, where he discovers a life-altering family secret.

Title: White Oleander
Description: A teenager journeys through a series of foster homes after her mother goes to prison for committing a crime of passion.

Title: Feast
Description: Patrons locked inside a bar are forced to fight monsters.

Title: Twilight Zone: The Movie
Description: Four horror and science fiction segments, directed by four famous directors, each of them being a new version of a classic story from

Title: Bubble Boy
Description: Bubble Boy's been in a bubble all his life due to no immune system. A cute blonde girl befriends BB. Her boyfriend proposes and BB decides to travel across USA to Niagara Falls to stop the wedding.

Title: The Human Stain
Description: When a disgraced former college dean has a romance with a mysterious younger woman haunted by her dark, twisted past, he is forced to confront a shocking fact about his own life that he has kept secret for fifty years.

Title: 22 Bullets
Description: A retired mobster goes on a revenge spree after being left for dead with 22 bullets in his body by his former childhood friend.

Title: Once Were Warriors
Description: A family descended from Maori warriors is bedeviled by a violent father and the societal problems of being treated as outcasts.

Title: The Three Stooges
Description: While trying to save their childhood orphanage, Moe, Larry and Curly inadvertently stumble into a murder plot and wind up starring in a reality television show.

Title: Oliver Twist
Description: An adaptation of the classic Dickens tale, where an orphan meets a pickpocket on the streets of London. From there, he joins a household of boys who are trained to steal for their master.

Title: Near Dark
Description: A small-town farmer's son reluctantly joins a traveling group of vampires after he is bitten by a beautiful drifter.

Title: The Muppet Movie
Description: Kermit and his newfound friends trek across America to find success in Hollywood, but a frog legs merchant is after Kermit.

Title: The Glass House
Description: An orphaned teenager is taken in by a Malibu couple but discovers they aren't the caring friends they seemed to be.

Title: True Crime
Description: Can an over-the-hill journalist uncover the evidence that can prove a death row inmate's innocence just hours before his execution?

Title: Blues Brothers 2000
Description: Elwood must reunite the old band, with a few new members, and go on another "Mission from God."

Title: The Seven Year Itch
Description: When his family goes away for the summer, a hitherto faithful husband with an overactive imagination is tempted by a beautiful neighbbor.

Title: Hang 'Em High
Description: When an innocent man barely survives a lynching, he returns as a lawman determined to bring the vigilantes to justice.

Title: Butterfly on a Wheel
Description: A perfect family's dynamic is ruined by a kidnapper's brutally efficient plot.

Title: An American Crime
Description: The true story of suburban housewife Gertrude Baniszewski, who kept a teenage girl locked in the basement of her Indiana home during the 1960s.

Title: Drunken Master
Description: Wong Fei-Hung is a mischievous yet righteous young man, but after a series of incidents his frustrated father has him disciplined by a master of drunken martial arts.

Title: Police Academy 5: Assignment: Miami Beach
Description: The Police Academy's commandant will be honored at a police convention in Miami Beach. At the airport he picks a wrong bag with stolen diamonds. The "owners" want them back.

Title: Hysteria
Description: The truth of how Mortimer Granville devised the invention of the first vibrator in the name of medical science.

Title: Come and See
Description: After finding an old rifle, a young boy joins the Soviet resistance movement against ruthless German forces and experiences the horrors of World War II.

Title: Jersey Boys
Description: The story of four young men from the wrong side of the tracks in New Jersey who came together to form the iconic 1960s rock group

Title: Victoria
Description: A young Spanish woman who has recently moved to Berlin finds her flirtation with a local guy turn potentially deadly as their night out with his friends reveals a dangerous secret.

Title: Five Easy Pieces
Description: A dropout from upper-class America picks up work along the way on oil rigs when his life isn't spent in a squalid succession of bars, motels, and other points of interest.

Title: Superbabies: Baby Geniuses 2

Title: The Art of War
Description: UN's secretary general uses covert operations to help diplomacy along. Shaw's called back 6 months after one such operation. He witnesses the murder of Chinese UN ambassador at UN, NYC, chases the assassin and ends up a suspect.

Title: Love Happens
Description: A widower whose book about coping with loss turns him into a best-selling self-help guru, falls for the hotel florist where his seminar is given, only to learn that he hasn't yet truly confronted his wife's passing.

Title: L.A. Story
Description: With the help of a talking freeway billboard, a wacky weatherman tries to win the heart of an English newspaper reporter, who is struggling to make sense of the strange world of early 1990s Los Angeles.

Title: Paranoid Park
Description: A teenage skateboarder's life begins to fray after he is involved in the accidental death of a security guard.

Title: Drugstore Cowboy
Description: A pharmacy-robbing dope fiend and his crew pop pills and evade the law.

Title: Repo Man

Title: The Arrival
Description: Zane, an astronomer, discovers intelligent alien life. But the aliens are keeping a deadly secret, and will do anything to stop Zane from learning it.

Title: The War of the Worlds
Description: A small town in California is attacked by Martians, beginning a worldwide invasion.

Title: The Physician
Description: In 11th-century Persia, a surgeon's apprentice disguises himself as a Jew to study at a school that does not admit Christians.

Title: Blood and Bone
Description: In Los Angeles, an ex-con takes the underground fighting world by storm in his quest to fulfill a promise to a dead friend.

Title: The Commitments
Description: Jimmy Rabbitte, an unemployed Dublin boy, decides to put together a soul band made up entirely of the Irish working class.

Title: Step Up All In
Description: All-stars from the previous Step Up installments come together in glittering Las Vegas, battling for a victory that could define their dreams and their careers.

Title: Picnic at Hanging Rock

Title: A Little Princess
Description: A young girl is relegated to servitude at a boarding school when her father goes missing and is presumed dead.

Title: Rockstar
Description: Janardhan Jakhar chases his dreams of becoming a big Rock star, during which he falls in love with Heer.
Hysterical Californians prepare for a Japanese invasion in the days after Pearl Harbor.

Title: Prince of Darkness
Description: A group of graduate students and scientists uncover an ancient canister in an abandoned church, but when they open the container, they inadvertently unleash a strange liquid and an evil force on all humanity.

Title: Women on the Verge of a Nervous Breakdown
Description: A television actress encounters a variety of eccentric characters after embarking on a journey to discover why her lover abruptly left her.

Title: Anything Else
Description: Jerry Falk learns a lesson the hard way when he falls in love with the beautiful but flighty Amanda.

Title: Double Team
Description: An international spy teams up with an arms dealer to escape from a penal colony and rescue his family from a terrorist.

Title: The Odd Couple
Description: A New Yorker newly separated from his wife moves in with his best friend, a divorced sportswriter, but their ideas of housekeeping and lifestyles are as different as night and day.

Title: The Hundred Year-Old Man Who Climbed Out of the Window and Disappeared
Description: After living a long and colorful life, Allan Karlsson finds himself stuck in a nursing home. On his 100th birthday, he leaps out a window and begins an unexpected journey.

Title: Goya's Ghosts
Description: Painter Francisco Goya faces a scandal involving his muse, who is labeled a heretic by a monk.

Title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles III
Description: When their closest friend April O'Neil discovers an ancient scepter with magical powers, the turtles must cow-a-bunga their way back to 17th century Japan to rescue her from the evil clutches of Lord Norinaga.

Title: Stranger Than Paradise
Description: A New Yorker's life is thrown into a tailspin when his younger cousin surprise-visits him, starting a strange, unpredictable adventure.

Title: The Vanishing
Description: Rex and Saskia, a young couple in love, are on vacation. They stop at a busy service station and Saskia is abducted. After three years and no sign of Saskia, Rex begins receiving letters from the abductor.

Title: Fido
Description: Space radiation turns the dead into Zombies. Zomcon fights zombies and finds ways to pacify and use them. On pre-teen Timmy's (Kesun Loder's) 1950s suburban street, they all have a zombie doing menial chores. Timmy's zombie becomes his pet and friend, and is named Fido (Sir Billy Connolly).

Title: Tsotsi
Description: Six days in the violent life of a young Johannesburg gang leader.

Title: Death Wish
Description: A New York City architect becomes a one-man vigilante squad after his wife is murdered by street punks. In self-defense, the vengeful man kills muggers on the mean streets after dark.

Title: Tora! Tora! Tora!
Description: The story of the 1941 Japanese air raid on Pearl Harbor, and the series of preceding American blunders that aggravated its effectiveness.

Title: Watership Down
Description: Hoping to escape destruction by human developers and save their community, a colony of rabbits, led by Hazel and Fiver, seek out a safe place to set up a new warren.

Title: Gods and Monsters
Description: The last days of

Title: Pulse
Description: When their computer hacker friend accidentally channels a mysterious wireless signal, a group of co-eds rally to stop a terrifying evil from taking over the world.

Title: The Machine
Description: In efforts to construct perfect android killing machines in a war against China, UK scientists exceed their goal and create a sentient robot.

Title: Chasing Mavericks
Description: When young Jay Moriarity discovers that the mythic Mavericks surf break, one of the biggest waves on Earth, exists just miles from his Santa Cruz home, he enlists the help of local legend Frosty Hesson to train him to survive it.

Title: The Barbarian Invasions
Description: During his final days, a dying man is reunited with old friends, former lovers, his ex-wife, and his estranged son.

Title: The Passion of Joan of Arc
Description: In 1431, Jeanne d'Arc is placed on trial on charges of heresy. The ecclesiastical jurists attempt to force Jeanne to recant her claims of holy visions.

Title: Police Academy: Mission to Moscow
Description: The Russian government hires the veterans of the

Title: The Lost Weekend
Description: The desperate life of a chronic alcoholic is followed through a four-day drinking bout.

Title: Sinister 2
Description: A young mother and her twin sons move into a rural house that's marked for death.

Title: The Trouble with Harry
Description: The trouble with Harry is that he is dead and, while no one really minds, everyone feels responsible. After Harry's body is found in the woods, several locals must determine not only how and why he was killed but what to do with the body.

Title: Babe: Pig in the City
Description: Babe, fresh from his victory in the sheepherding contest, returns to Farmer Hoggett's farm, but after Farmer Hoggett is injured and unable to work, Babe has to go to the big city to save the farm.

Title: The Big Hit
Description: Socially anxious hitman Melvin Smiley, an expert in his lucrative field, goes on a job and falls in love with his kidnapping victim, turning his world upside down.

Title: Pushing Tin
Description: A feud develops between two air traffic controllers: one cocky and determined while the other is restrained and laidback, which inevitably affects their lives.

Title: Child's Play 3
Description: Chucky returns for revenge against Andy, the young boy who defeated him, and now a teenager living in a military academy.

Title: Murder by Death
Description: Five famous literary detective characters and their sidekicks are invited to a bizarre mansion to solve an even stranger mystery.

Title: The Eye
Description: A blind girl gets a cornea transplant so that she will be able to see again. She gets more than she bargained for upon realizing she can also see ghosts.

Title: Winter Sleep
Description: A hotel owner and landlord in a remote Turkish village deals with conflicts within his family and a tenant behind on his rent.

Title: Black Sea
Description: In order to make good with his former employers, a submarine captain takes a job with a shadowy backer to search the depths of the Black Sea for a submarine rumored to be loaded with gold.

Title: Tank Girl

Title: A Long Way Down

Title: Multiplicity

Title: A Night at the Opera

Title: Seraphim Falls

Title: Left Behind

Title: Micmacs
Description: A man and his friends come up with an intricate and original plan to destroy two big weapons manufacturers.

Title: Annie

Title: Compliance

Title: A Walk in the Clouds

Title: A.W.O.L.: Absent Without Leave

Title: Ong Bak 2

Title: The Grandmaster
Description: The story of martial-arts master Ip Man, the man who trained Bruce Lee.

Title: Troll 2

Title: Don

Title: The Witches

Title: Resident Evil: Degeneration

Title: The Whistleblower

Title: Jack Frost

Title: The Visitors

Title: Scouts Guide to the Zombie Apocalypse

Title: The Limey
Description: An extremely volatile and dangerous Englishman goes to Los Angeles to find the man he considers responsible for his daughter's death.

Title: Celeste & Jesse Forever
Description: A divorcing couple tries to maintain their friendship while they both pursue other people.

Title: Gummo
Description: Lonely residents of a tornado-stricken Ohio town wander the deserted landscape trying to fulfill their boring, nihilistic lives.

Title: Dark Water
Description: A mother and her 6 year old daughter move into a creepy apartment whose every surface is permeated by water.

Title: Barbarella
Description: Barbarella, an astronaut from the 41st century, sets out to find and stop the evil scientist Durand Durand, whose Positronic Ray threatens to bring evil back into the galaxy.

Title: Rumble Fish
Description: Absent-minded street thug Rusty James struggles to live up to his legendary older brother's reputation, and longs for the days of gang warfare.

Title: Muppets Most Wanted
Description: While on a grand world tour,

Title: The Lord of the Rings
Description: The Fellowship of the Ring embark on a journey to destroy the One Ring and end Sauron's reign over Middle-earth.

Title: Before We Go
Description: Two strangers stuck in Manhattan for the night grow into each other's most trusted confidants when an evening of unexpected adventure forces them to confront their fears and take control of their lives.

Title: Them

Title: Universal Soldier: The Return
Description: The "universal soldiers" must fight the whole army, when the military's supercomputer S.E.T.H gets out of control.

Title: Radio Days
Description: A nostalgic look at radio's golden age focusing on one ordinary family and the various performers in the medium.

Title: Powder
Description: An off the charts genius who is home schooled and shunned after his last relative dies shows the unconscious residents of his town about connection awareness and the generosity of the spirit.

Title: A Mighty Heart
Description: Mariane Pearl embarks on a frantic search to locate her journalist husband, Daniel, when he goes missing in Pakistan.

Title: Looney Tunes: Back in Action
Description: The Looney Tunes search for a man's missing father and the mythical Blue Monkey diamond.

Title: The Idiots
Description: The group of people gather at the house in Copenhagen suburb to break all the limitations and to bring out the "inner idiot" in themselves.

Title: Michael Collins
Description: Neil Jordan's historical biopic of Irish revolutionary

Title: The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh
Description: In this collection of animated shorts based on the stories and characters by A.A. Milne, Winnie the Pooh, a honey-loving teddy bear, embarks on some eccentric adventures.

Title: Leaves of Grass

Title: Things We Lost in the Fire

Title: Hop
Description: E.B., the Easter Bunny's teenage son, heads to Hollywood, determined to become a drummer in a rock 'n' roll band. In LA, he's taken in by Fred after the out-of-work slacker hits E.B. with his car.

Title: Single White Female
Description: A woman advertising for a new roommate finds that something very strange is going on with the tenant who decides to move in.

Title: Harry and the Hendersons
Description: The Henderson family adopt a friendly Sasquatch but have a hard time trying to keep the legend of 'Bigfoot' a secret.

Title: The Accused
Description: After a young woman suffers a brutal gang rape in a bar one night, a prosecutor assists in bringing the perpetrators to justice, including the ones who encouraged and cheered on the attack.

Title: The Quiet American
Description: An old British reporter vies with a young U.S. doctor for the affections of a beautiful Vietnamese woman.

Title: My Boss's Daughter
Description: After a man is asked to house sit for his boss, he becomes determined to get closer to the boss's daughter, but events keep unfolding that stop him from achieving his goal.

Title: Song of the Sea

Title: The Hidden Fortress

Description: The story follows a group of German soldiers, from their Italian R&R in the summer of 1942 to the frozen steppes of Soviet Russia and ending with the battle for Stalingrad.

Title: Sorority Row
Description: A group of sorority sisters try to cover up the death of their house-sister after a prank gone wrong, only to be stalked by a serial killer.

Title: Au Revoir les Enfants
Description: A French boarding school run by priests seems to be a haven from World War II until a new student arrives. Occupying the next bed in the dormitory to the top student in his class, the two young boys begin to form a bond.

Title: Nixon
Description: A biographical story of former U.S. President

Title: Primary Colors
Description: A man joins the political campaign of a smooth-operator candidate for President of the U.S.

Title: Altered States
Description: A psycho-physiologist experiments with drugs and a sensory-deprivation tank and has visions he believes are genetic memories.

Description: A former sports star who's fallen on hard times starts coaching his son's football team as a way to get his life together. His attempts to become an adult are met with challenges from the attractive football moms who pursue him at every turn.

Title: The Man Who Knew Too Little

Title: Jimmy Neutron: Boy Genius
Description: An eight-year-old boy genius and his friends must rescue their parents after the adults are abducted by aliens.

Title: Serial (Bad) Weddings

Title: Dressed to Kill
Description: A mysterious blonde woman kills one of a psychiatrist's patients, and then goes after the high-class call girl who witnessed the murder.

Title: The Football Factory
Description: An insight on the gritty life of a bored male, Chelsea football hooligan who lives for violence, sex, drugs & alcohol.

Title: Can't Buy Me Love

Title: Miss Potter
Description: The story of Beatrix Potter, the author of the beloved and best-selling children's book, "The Tale of Peter Rabbit", and her struggle for love, happiness, and success.

Title: Tales from Earthsea
Description: In a mythical land, a man and a young boy investigate a series of unusual occurrences.

Title: The People Under the Stairs
Description: Two adults and a juvenile break into a house occupied by a brother and sister and their stolen children. There, they must fight for their lives.

Title: King of New York
Description: A drug kingpin is released from prison and seeks to take total control of the criminal underworld in order to give back to the community.

Title: Popeye
Description: The adventures of the famous sailor man and his friends in the seaside town of Sweethaven.

A mix up with the Farmer, a caravan and a very steep hill lead them all to the Big City and it's up to Shaun and the flock to return everyone safely to the green grass of home.

Title: Hush

Title: Torque

Title: New Jack City
Description: A crime lord ascends to power and becomes megalomaniacal while a maverick police detective vows to stop him.

Title: The Tailor of Panama

Title: Sleep Tight
Description: You wake day after day to the comfort and security of your home. But how safe is it really?

Title: Mutant Chronicles
Description: 28th century soldier Mitch Hunter leads a fight against an army of underworld Mutants.

Title: 8 Women
Description: One murdered man, eight women, each seeming to be eager than the others to know the truth. Gimme, gimme, gimme some clues to make up my mind. And eventually enter the truth. Oh, thou cruel woman!

Title: The Double
Description: A retired CIA operative is paired with a young FBI agent to unravel the mystery of a senator's murder, with all signs pointing to a Soviet assassin.

Title: Another Year
Description: A look at four seasons in the lives of a happily married couple and their relationships with their family and friends.

Title: Murder at 1600
Description: A young woman is murdered in the White House. Homicide detective Regis (

Title: And Now for Something Completely Different
Description: An anthology of the best sketches from the first and second seasons of

Title: From Justin to Kelly
Description: A waitress from Texas and a college student from Pennsylvania meet during spring break in Fort Lauderdale, Florida and come together through their shared love of singing.

Title: Andrei Rublev
Description: The life, times and afflictions of the fifteenth-century Russian iconographer St. Andrei Rublev.

Title: Critters
Description: A group of small but vicious alien creatures called Crites escape from an alien prison transport vessel and land near a small farm town on earth, pursued by two shape-shifting bounty hunters.

Title: Suspicion
Description: A shy young heiress marries a charming gentleman, and soon begins to suspect he is planning to murder her.

Title: Virtuosity
Description: When a virtual reality simulation created using the personalities of multiple serial killers manages to escape into the real world, an ex-cop is tasked with stopping its reign of terror.

Title: Creep
Description: Trapped in a London subway station, a woman who's being pursued by a potential attacker heads into the unknown labyrinth of tunnels beneath the city's streets.

Title: Oscar
Description: A gangster attempts to keep the promise he made to his dying father: that he would give up his life of crime and "go straight".

Title: Searching for Bobby Fischer
Description: A prepubescent chess prodigy refuses to harden himself in order to become a champion like the famous but unlikable Bobby Fischer.

Title: Escape from the Planet of the Apes
Description: The world is shocked by the appearance of three talking chimpanzees, who arrived mysteriously in a U.S. spacecraft. They become the toast of society, but one man believes them to be a threat to the human race.

Title: The Perfect Man
Description: A lonely mother begins receiving romantic e-mails from a secret admirer, unaware that this perfect man is really a creation of her daughter who is trying to cheer her up.

Title: Mesrine Part 2: Public Enemy Number 1
Description: The story of the notorious French gangster

Title: Kagemusha
Description: A petty thief with an utter resemblance to a samurai warlord is hired as the lord's double. When the warlord later dies the thief is forced to take up arms in his place.

Title: Rabbit-Proof Fence
Description: In 1931, three half-white, half-Aboriginal girls escape after being plucked from their houses to be trained as domestic staff, and set off on a journey across the Outback.

Title: Cyborg
Description: A martial artist hunts a killer in a plague-infested urban dump of the future.

Title: Heavy Metal
Description: A glowing green orb - which embodies ultimate evil - terrorizes a young girl with an anthology of bizarre and fantastic stories of dark fantasy, eroticism and horror.

Title: 13 Sins
Description: A cryptic phone call sets off a dangerous game of risks for Elliot, a down-on-his-luck salesman. The game promises increasing rewards for completing 13 tasks, each more sinister than the last.

Title: Interstate 60: Episodes of the Road
Description: Neal Oliver, a very confused young man and an artist, takes a journey of a lifetime on a highway I60 that doesn't exist on any of the maps, going to the places he never even heard of, searching for an answer and his dreamgirl.

Title: Henry V
Description: In the midst of the Hundred Years War, the young King Henry V of England embarks on the conquest of France in 1415.

Title: Naked
Description: An unemployed Mancunian vents his rage on unsuspecting strangers as he embarks on a nocturnal London odyssey.

Title: *batteries not included
Description: Aliens help a feisty old New York couple in their battle against the ruthless land developer who's out to evict them.

Title: The Stepfather
Description: Michael Harding (Penn Badgely) returns home from military school to find his mother Susan (Sela Ward) happily in love and living with her new boyfriend David (Dylan Walsh). As the two men get to know each other, he becomes more and more suspicious of the man who is always there to help.

Title: Confessions of a Teenage Drama Queen
Description: A teenage girl is convinced that her home city revolves around her until her family packs up and moves to the suburbs, where she finds herself competing for attention.

Title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop 2
Description: After six years of keeping our malls safe, Paul Blart has earned a well-deserved vacation. He heads to Las Vegas with his teenage daughter before she heads off to college. But safety never takes a holiday and when duty calls, Blart answers.

Title: Fortress

Title: Nosferatu the Vampyre

Title: Regarding Henry
Description: After being shot, a lawyer loses his memory and must relearn speech and mobility, but he has a loving family to support him.

Title: The Assassination of Richard Nixon
Description: Based on real life events, Assassination is set in 1974 and centers on a businessman who decides to take extreme measures to achieve his American dream.

Title: The Replacement Killers
Description: A troubled hitman seeks aid from a forger to help him get papers to China. However, the drug lord has hired replacements to finish the job, and kill the hitman.

Title: Sid and Nancy
Description: The relationship between

Title: Hatchet
Description: When a group of tourists in a New Orleans haunted swamp tour find themselves stranded in the wilderness, their evening of fun and spooks turns into a horrific nightmare.

Title: Body Heat
Description: In the midst of a searing Florida heat wave, a woman persuades her lover, a small-town lawyer, to murder her rich husband.

Title: Black
Description: The cathartic tale of a young woman who can't see, hear, or speak, and the teacher who brings a ray of light into her dark world.

Title: McFarland
Description: Jim White moves his family after losing his last job as a football coach, and at his new school he turns seven disappointing students into one of the best cross-country teams in the region.

Title: Krull
Description: A prince and a fellowship of companions set out to rescue his bride from a fortress of alien invaders who have arrived on their home planet.

Title: A Civil Action
Description: A tenacious lawyer takes on a case involving a major company responsible for causing several people to be diagnosed with leukemia due to the town's water supply being contaminated, at the risk of bankrupting his firm and career.

Title: To Have and Have Not
Description: During World War II, American expatriate Harry Morgan helps transport a French Resistance leader and his beautiful wife to Martinique while romancing a sensuous lounge singer.

Title: Adore
Description: A pair of childhood friends and neighbors fall for each other's sons.

Title: The Salvation
Description: In 1870s America, the fury of a notorious gang leader is unleashed when a peaceful American settler avenges the death of his family. Then as his cowardly fellow townspeople betray him, he is forced to hunt down the outlaws alone.

Title: Henry: Portrait of a Serial Killer

Title: Maximum Overdrive
Description: A group of people try to survive when machines start to come alive and become homicidal.

Description: 1183 A.D.: King Henry II's three sons all want to inherit the throne, but he won't commit to a choice. When he allows his imprisoned wife Eleanor of Aquitaine out for a Christmas visit, they all variously plot to force him into a decision.

Title: Housebound

Title: Lone Star

Title: Blood In, Blood Out

Title: Paper Moon
Description: During the Great Depression, a con man finds himself saddled with a young girl who may or may not be his daughter, and the two forge an unlikely partnership.

Title: The Holy Mountain
Description: In a corrupt, greed-fueled world, a powerful alchemist leads a messianic character and seven materialistic figures to the Holy Mountain, where they hope to achieve enlightenment.

Title: Pride and Prejudice and Zombies
